delta_method_descr.title: Delta Method Description
delta_method_descr.description: The actual changes to be applied to the feature. If 'geometry' is provided, it completely replaces the old one. If 'attributes' provided, it merges the contents with the already existing feature using https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7386

geometry.title: Geometry
geometry.description: Feature's geometry serialized in WKT. GeoJSON has a number of limitations so it was reconsidered.

attributes.title: Attributes
attributes.description: Feature's attributes to be changed. The rest of the properties are ignored.

version.title: The Deltas File Format Version
version.description: Currently the only allowed value is 1.0, but in the future there might be newer minor or major versions.

projectId.title: Project ID
projectId.description: The project ID that is current open on QField.

id.title: Delta File ID
id.description: The delta file ID generated on the client to distinguish requests.

deltas.title: Deltas
deltas.description: A list of the deltas to be applied sent to the server.

items.title: A Single Delta
items.description: Describes the changes to be applied to a single feature.

fid_NOT_ENABLED_UNTIL_FID_IS_UUID.title: Feature ID Schema
fid_NOT_ENABLED_UNTIL_FID_IS_UUID.description: To be able to unique identify features in the layers, we assign UUID as feature ID. We use UUID instead of sequential integer, so we can assign the value on QField, before sending it back to the server.

layerId.title: Layer ID
layerId.description: The layer ID is the same as in the QGIS project file. Each delta file is responsible for a single layer.

method.title: Method
method.description:
What type of operation to be applied to the feature.
'create' - creates new feature
'patch' - modifies certain values in an existing feature
'delete' - deletes an existing feature

files.title: Files
files.description: A list of the files to be uploaded to the server.

items.title: Filename
items.description: Filename with path relative to project root
